info.name: Big Chungus api Documentation
info.description: Here you can check info about the rest API created for our web app, like descriptions, parámeters or even posibles responses.

item.name: Anime
item.description: API Endpoints for working with animes

item.name: Get every anime on the database

response.name: Get every anime on the database Response #1

item.name: Store a newly created anime in storage.
Get the data of the anime.

response.name: Get the data of the anime. Response #1

item.name: Update the specified anime in storage, given the id and the request with the new data
Delete an anime from the database.
Friend
item.description: API Endpoints for working with friends

item.name: Add an existing user as friend
Get a friend info (useless)
Confirm a friend invitation you recieve (set the confirmation date to now)
Remove a friendship you belong to
Get every friend of the specified user, both confirmed as not confirmed yet.

response.name: Get every friend of the specified user, both confirmed as not confirmed yet. Response #1

item.name: Update the specified manga in storage, given the id and the request with the new data

Message
item.description: API Endpoints for working with user messages

item.name: See all message you belong to (both sent by and to you)

item.name: Send a new message
Display a message you belong to

response.name: Display a message you belong to Response #1

item.name: Delete a message you have created
Read (Manga Lists)
item.description: API Endpoints for working with users manga lists

item.name: Get all mangas in an user list

response.name: Get all mangas in an user list Response #1

item.name: Get the manga read status from any user

response.name: Get the manga read status from any user Response #1

item.name: Add a new manga to the current user list.
Update the specified manga read status, score or favourite from an user
Update the specified manga read status, score or favourite from an user
Delete the manga from an user list.
User
api/user
Obtains a list of all users

response.name: Obtains a list of all users Response #1

item.name: Obtains the specified user.
Update the user role from user to admin or viceversa.
Remove the specified user from storage.
Register a new user in the database
Log in the user.
Get the user info of the authenticated user you call the method from

response.name: Get the user info of the authenticated user you call the method from Response #1
